revised_title: Adsorption Potential in the Hydrodynamic Model of Metals: Analysis and Mathematical Developments
tldr: This article analyzes the adsorption potential in the hydrodynamic model of metals, focusing on a continuous fluid confined by impenetrable barriers with assigned plasma frequency and hydrodynamic sound velocity. The authors present a mathematical analysis of the potential, including the behavior at large and small distances, and discuss the connection with other work in the field.
